text: Sultan Sheikhmus (Kurdish: ) or with his full name Musa bin Mahin El-Mardini ez-Zûlî (b. 1077, Mardin; d. 1164, Mardin), was an Islamic scholar and a student of Abdul Qadir Gilani . His tomb is in the village of Yüce on the Mardin-Diyarbakır road. == References == Category:1164 deaths Category:1077 births
title: Sultan Sheikhmus
